title: Tabs crashing
content: Firefox will load eventually but when I try to open a tab it crashes immediately
creator: art4trish

title: Barre laterali scorrimento
content: Con i nuovi aggiornamenti le barre laterali (alto verso il basso e sx-dx) sono diventate sottilissime, e rendono firefox davvero difficile da usare quando le pagine necessitano di scorrere nelle varie dimensioni. non trovo opzioni per modificarle (e cambiando tema, non cambia nulla)
creator: alex.paoli

title: Application login issue
content: Application login with url: "https://www-40preprod.cpc.ibm.com/services/partners/jp/reimbursesupport/" is not working from firefox. Application is working fine from other browsers. We had OIDC redirect URL issue earlier which was fixed with this case: TS013165695. PMR team suspect issue is with firefox browser, please help us to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Thanks.
creator: apoorva.b.g

title: yahoo  keeps  taking  over  from firefox  . how do I  permanently  stop  it  please
content: How to stop and delete yahoo which keeps taking over from firefox
creator: cathy34

title: Internet Window Location Move Bug
content: I'm using a dual monitor Use Windows 11 automatic window sorting. I work with various internet windows on the auxiliary monitor When doing other tasks, the window moves from side to side for a few pixels. So it invades the main monitor area. There is nothing wrong with other web browsers and only Firefox works What is the solution?
creator: dakooro

title: SCORM Content no longer loading
content: I am Using TalentLMS and the courses that are SCORM files which load via a frame no longer load at all. They just come up blank. I have turned off the enhanced tracking protection, ive allowed talentlsm cookies, and followed all the help articles but it still wont load. Does anyone know how to make it load Thanks
creator: qualityandcompliance

title: firefox har förhindrat att den här sidan automatiskt styr om till en annan sida
content: Jag använder VismaNet och får felmeddelande "firefox har förhindrat att den här sidan automatiskt styr om till en annan sida" när jag loggar in, hur kan jag tillåta detta så att jag slipper trycka på knappne "Tillåt".
creator: eva.marie.griffiths

title: Inconsistent behavior of Intl.DateTimeFormat for en-AU local for specified options on firefox
content:
Issue tested on Firefox:113.0.2 Firefox behaves differently with Intl.DateTimeFormat for en-AU local for specified options

Steps to reproduce: (1)Open dev tools console and run the following: (2)Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-AU', { 

   year: 'numeric',    month: 'numeric',    day: 'numeric',    hour: 'numeric',    minute: '2-digit',    timeZone: 'UTC',

}).format(new Date('2022-04-02T15:30:00Z'))

(3)Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-AU', { 

   dateStyle: 'short',    timeStyle: 'short',    timeZone: 'UTC'

}).format(new Date('2022-04-02T15:30:00Z'))

Expected Behvaior: First command output - 2/4/2022, 3:30 pm(day and month without leading zero) Second command output - 2/4/22, 3:30 pm (year in two digits)

Actual Behavior: First command output on: 

 Chrome/Firefox : → 02/04/2022, 3:30 pm   Safari         : → 2/4/2022, 3:30 pm

(Notice the leading zero in day and month for chrome and firefox)

Second command output on: 

 Chrome/Firefox : → 2/4/22, 3:30 pm  Safari         : → 2/4/2022, 3:30 pm

(Notice Safari displays d/M/yyyy)

Chromium bug - https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1454341
creator: shubhangide25

title: Turning Color and Font Overrides On and Off per Website?
content:
Firefox provides the wonderful accessibility setting to override any website's css with custom colors and fonts, but this breaks some websites. I was wondering if there was any way (either by default, an add-on, or css-hack) to set custom colors and fonts per-website? Currently the only way to do this is to manually turn the settings off when you want to browse a website that it breaks - it would be very useful to have a website whitelist. At the very least it would be useful to have an "accessibility" button in the toolbar that turns on and off css overrides.

Thanks
creator: govindarajan.advith

title: Google search results broken
content:
Hello,

Hello,

Today I have noticed that website for Google search results are not showing up correct as you can see in the screenshot. Images, news, video's, maps, books, flight and finance doesn't show up correctly I checked with incognito mode it seems to be working fine. I have also tried to turn off add-ons but sadly that didn't work for me does anyone know a easy fix?
creator: Fu_Xuan

title: FF's window
content: on win11 FF keeps resetting my left window adjustment , even though i keep changing it as far left as i can, it keeps changing it causing my bookmarks to display on the left side, i want them on the right. when i reset FF all the way to the left the (toolbar) bookmarks show on the left the way i want, but as soon as i close & reopen FF, it repositions the window again, then the bookmarks pop up on the right, not the left as i set it.
creator: johnbelbeck

title: website issue on firfox
content: Hi, when i try to open my wordpress website on firfox browser it said this site is blocked my website is related to pickleball reviews: https://bestpickleballreviews.com/
creator: bestpickleballs

title: Crash every 15 min
content:
The browser crashes after about 15 minutes of using it for work. I have deleted all of my cookies, updated Firefox to the latest update, and disabled hardware acceleration. I then restarted my computer and the problem happened again. Is there anything else I could try to get the browser to not crash anymore? I do not want to have to switch to Google Chrome if I do not have to.

title: Anyone else having video playback issues with Intel Iris XE on newest versions of firefox?
content: I've been noticing that Firefox does not play nice with the newest drivers with my integrated graphics (Intel Iris XE, CPU 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1155G7 @ 2.50GHz 2.50 GHz), and while it's been getting better (Before it made videos play at 1fps, now it just makes the youtube hud laggy), it is still rather concerning. weirdly the ESR version of firefox which i'm using currently is not having the issues at all though. This is more me checking to see if i'm alone in this situation or not. Currently using the December 2022 drivers and while it seems to be playing nice so far, this will become an issue sooner or later again.
creator: onionknight0125

title: Anything thing related to Firefox wont open
content: so I restarted my computer for an update then when the update happens my Firefox does not open at all. Not even the profile manager which is supposed to fix these problems. Firefox flashes open for like a millisecond and then closes immediately afterwards not even full screen a tiny window.
creator: SilasExperiment

title: History Library problem
content:
Hi

recently my computer crashed and after restart firefox restored a session. I have noticed that some of my tabs are missing and i have found out that restored session is about 1 month old. Then I have opened History Library and searched it for at least some of my lost tabs. I noticed that if I select May it shows me 6434 items for May but if I select April, it shows history for April, May and June, but now it has only 194 items for May. Then I select March, and it has only 125 items for May. For January it has 131 items for May so there is something very strange going on. What purpose does this history hiding serve? It should either show history only for selected month or all history from selected month to current date, or even better all history between two dates selected by user. Another great improvement would be filtering by "-" symbol for example "-https://www.google.com/maps" will remove google maps from viewed items (but everything is still saved in history).
creator: peto819

title: The Email I used when I logged in is dead and gone.  I can't change it because I cant receive the messages at the old email address
content:
Please help. I have a serious problem with my email set-up. The account I am signed up with here no longer has a working email access. I tried to follow the instructions at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/change-primary-email-address-firefox-accounts but the account wont let me add a secondary email address because it is sending confirmation requests to the DEAD email address.

Can anyone help?

Ciao, Kaelkitty.
creator: Kaelkitty
